sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import "./Main.css"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; export const Main = () => { const [currentSlide, setCurrentSlide] = useState(0); const [totalVisible, setTotalVisible] = useState(4); // Default to 4 images per slide const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleProductClick = (productId) => { navigate(`/product/${productId}`); }; const imageData = [ { src: "assets/img-1.png", alt: "Knitted Joggers", label: "Knitted Joggers" }, { src: "assets/img-3.jpg", alt: "Full Sleeve", label: "Full Sleeve" }, { src: "assets/img-4.jpg", alt: "Active T-Shirts", label: "Active T-Shirts" }, { src: "assets/img-2.jpg", alt: "Urban Shirts", label: "Urban Shirts" }, { src: "assets/img-1.png", alt: "Denim Jacket", label: "Denim Jacket" }, { src: "assets/img-3.jpg", alt: "Casual Hoodie", label: "Casual Hoodie" }, { src: "assets/img-4.jpg", alt: "Summer Shorts", label: "Summer Shorts" }, { src: "assets/img-2.jpg", alt: "Sneakers", label: "Sneakers" }, ]; // Dynamic update of images per slide based on screen size useEffect(() => { const updateVisibleImages = () => { if (window.innerWidth <= 640) { setTotalVisible(2); // Show 2 images per slide after 640px } else if (window.innerWidth <= 768) { setTotalVisible(3); // Show 3 images per slide after 768px } else { setTotalVisible(4); // Default to 4 images per slide } }; updateVisibleImages(); window.addEventListener("resize", updateVisibleImages); return () => { window.removeEventListener("resize", updateVisibleImages); }; }, []); const maxSlides = imageData.length - totalVisible; const handleClickLeft = () => { setCurrentSlide((prevSlide) => Math.max(prevSlide - 1, 0)); }; const handleClickRight = () => { setCurrentSlide((prevSlide) => Math.min(prevSlide + 1, maxSlides)); }; return ( <> {/* Spotlight Section */}

cool / colorful / comfy

    Style

{/* New Arrival Section */}

New Arrival

    {imageData.map((item, index) => (

  • {item.label}

    • ))}
{/* Shop Now Section */}

FASHION BETTER!

In our journey to improve everyday fashion,
euphoria presents EVERYDAY wear range -
Comfortable & Affordable fashion 24/7

{/* Categories for Men Section */}

{item.description}

))}

{item.description}

{/* Top-Brands Section */}
{/* Limelight Section */}

{item.name}

{item.brand}

{item.price}
)) ) : (

No products available

)}
{/* Feedback Section */}

Feedback

{FeedbackData.map((feedback) => (

{feedback.name}

{Array.isArray(feedback.comment) ? ( feedback.comment.map((line, index) => (

{line}

)) ) : (

{feedback.comment}

)}
))}
); }; export default Main;
